Server.Service

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.concurrent.Service<java.lang.Void>
      • Server.Service.DataManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.concurrent.Worker<java.lang.Void>, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class DataManager
extends javafx.concurrent.Service<java.lang.Void>
    Is a service of the server and is responsible for handling all incoming and outgoing data.
